selected_quotes: The illegal reptile trade is dangerous to native wildlife.
Some challenges for the management of #exotic vertebrates, check out our piece
Australia being flooded by illegal #reptiles, a serious threat to the nation, writes
Stop the illegal reptile trade! Australian #biosecurity is at risk

citation.abstract: Keeping non-native reptiles as pets is against the law – with good reason. Alien species traded on the black market can potentially establish themselves in the wild if they are released or escape.
citation.title: Alien invaders: the illegal reptile trade is a serious threat to Australia
